description.p: Enchanted wooden box constructed by the Woodmen. Measures 12"x8"x6". Keeps herbs fresh for months or stores enough food to feed one person for a month. Given to each PC by the Woodmen.

special.p: Food preservation - 1 month supply in small box

description.p: Old family heirloom originally forged in Gondolin. The enchanted blade glows with a cold blue light when near creatures of Darkness.

special.p: Glows blue near creatures of Darkness (Orcs, Trolls, Spiders, etc.)

description.p: Silver necklace bearing an amber medallion in the form of a compass rose. Worn by Skauril. Allows the wearer to cast Leaving on five creatures at the same time, sending them in up to six different directions.

special.p: Cast Leaving on 5 creatures simultaneously, send in up to 6 directions

description.p: Emerald ring given by Thranduil to signify Elf-friend status. Bears no enchantment but is quite valuable and grants recognition among the Elves.

special.p: Mark of Elf-friend status, valuable (500+ gp)

description.p: Medicinal herbs from the Woodmen's limited supply. +10 to healing when properly applied.
